6282.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy Effective Date: Last Updated as of March 18, 2019.
6282.quoteText:
Third parties serve third party cookies through our website for advertising, analytics and other purposes.
These third parties may use information about your visits to directly.com and other websites to provide relevant advertisements about goods and services that you may be interested in.
They may also employ technology that is used to measure the effectiveness of advertisements.
6282.title: This service allows tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including targeted advertising.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

6283.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy Effective Date: Last Updated as of March 18, 2019.
6283.quoteText: Please note that if you choose to block cookies, doing so may impair the Services or prevent certain elements of it from functioning.
6283.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

6329.quoteDoc: Terms of Service  Effective Date: Last Updated as of March 18, 2019.
6329.quoteText: We may suspend or limit your rights to use the Services at any time for any reason at our sole discretion, including any use of the Services in violation of these Terms.
6329.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
